post.author: Helen Park
post.content:
Senior System Support Analyst (MVS
internals/DB2/CICS/MQ/Websphere) – MYWWL05618


Job Description
The incumbent of this position will be part of the HSSD Software Support Team that
provides round the clock on-site or on-call support to all mainframe systems and software.
The job functions include: service restoration, root cause analysis which may involve
collection and analysis of dump and trace data, vendor liaison, application of software fixes
or workarounds, proactive problem prevention and service improvements.

Qualifications
This is a senior technical position. The candidate should have a computer science degree
or equivalent and at least 6 years of IT experience (programming or software support) in the
IBM mainframe environment. Must have applied skills in one or more of: programming
language, debugging techniques, system interface/monitoring tools, software maintenance
practices. Knowledge of MVS internals, DB2, CICS, MQ and Websphere is required.

Knowledge of BMO organization, applications and computing environment would be an
asset.

Additionally, the individual must have strong customer service orientation, problem solving
abilities and communications skills.

Ability to work under pressure is essential.

Please send cover letter quoting reference number and job title along
             with a current resume to bmo.careers@exult.net or interoffice to Exult
             Recruiting BMTT, 6th Floor.
post.title: BMO, Senior DB2/CICS/MQ/Websphere
